title: Software
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321103315/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : Software**

For web-based applications, see. [Tools](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321103315/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tools).

[Font Editors](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321103315/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font%20Editors) - for the design and publishing of font files  
 [Font Development Software](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321103315/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font%20Development%20Software) -  
 [Font Validation Software](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321103315/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font%20Validation%20Software) -  
 [Font Management Software](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321103315/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font%20Management%20Software) - for managing fonts installed on computer systems  
 [Design Applications](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321103315/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Design%20Applications) - graphic design, composition  
 [Python Scripts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321103315/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Python%20Scripts) - scripts for advanced type designers

[Revision Control](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321103315/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Revision%20Control) - software to keep track of the revision history of computer files
